content.html: "It's a real shame that this is the world we find ourselves in now. One so sharply divided by politics and ideology that we can't even share the love of Ruby on Rails together at a conference without a need to settle scores." world.hey.com/dhh/no-railsco…
content.value: "It's a real shame that this is the world we find ourselves in now. One so sharply divided by politics and ideology that we can't even share the love of Ruby on Rails together at a conference without a need to settle scores." world.hey.com/dhh/no-railsco…

content.html: Wait so let me get this straight. You’re upset you have to *checks notes* share the stage with other enthusiastic developers? Yes it is a real shame that this is the world we find ourselves in now. Homeboy needs to be humbled.
content.value:
Wait so let me get this straight. You’re upset you have to *checks notes* share the stage with other enthusiastic developers?

Yes it is a real shame that this is the world we find ourselves in now.

Homeboy needs to be humbled.
